extracted_news.title: Tether (USDT) Hits $100 Billion Market Cap, Faces Competition from First Digital USD (FDUSD)
extracted_news.body: Tether (USDT) achieves $100 billion market cap, becoming the third cryptocurrency to enter the exclusive club. However, its trading volumes still lag behind 2021 peaks. Binance-backed First Digital USD (FDUSD) emerges as a strong competitor, capturing a significant market share.

extracted_news.title: Binance to Launch New Spot Trading Pairs Including OM/TRY and PEPE/FDUSD
extracted_news.body: Binance is set to expand its spot trading offerings by adding new pairs such as OM/TRY, PEPE/FDUSD, PIXEL/USDC, STRK/USDC, THETA/TRY, and UNI/FDUSD. According to BlockBeats news on March 4th, these trading pairs will be available from 16:00 on March 5th, aiming to provide users with a broader range of options for spot trading.

extracted_news.title: Binance Futures to Cease Support for USDP as Cross Collateral, Introduces FDUSD
extracted_news.body: Starting from 17:00 on March 8, 2024, Binance Futures will support FDUSD as a joint margin asset, and will stop supporting USDP as a joint margin asset at 14:00 on March 14, 2024 (Beijing time). Due to this change, the transfer limit of USDP under the joint margin mode has been updated to zero. After 14:00 on March 14, 2024, any remaining USDP balance in the U-based contract wallet will be automatically converted to USDT at a ratio of 1:1, which may take approximately 24 hours and may not be displayed in the transaction history.

extracted_news.title: FDUSD Trading Pair Reaches Historical High in Binance Spot Trading
extracted_news.body: The trading volume of the FDUSD trading pair in Binance spot trading has reached a historical high, accounting for 38% of the total trading volume. According to BlockBeats news on February 15th, data from The Block Pro shows that as of February 12th, the trading volume of the FDUSD trading pair on Binance spot trading has risen to 38%, reaching a historical high, and the trading volume has increased by 42.6% month-on-month in January.

extracted_news.title: FDUSD Reaches Record Trading Volume on Binance After Replacing BUSD
extracted_news.body: The First Digital USD Stablecoin (FDUSD) and spot trading volume on Binance reached its highest ever share, accounting for 38% of the exchange's total spot trading volume on February 12. This marks a significant increase of 42.6% compared to the previous month, highlighting the growing importance of FDUSD in the crypto trading landscape. The increase in FDUSD trading volume is attributed to Binance's decision to discontinue support for BUSD, encouraging users to switch to FDUSD. Introduced by FD121, a subsidiary of Hong Kong-based custody and trust company First Digital, FDUSD was launched in June 2023 and listed on Binance a month later with zero trading fees. This significant increase in trading volume indicates that stablecoins, especially those with favorable trading conditions and solid utility, are increasingly preferred in the cryptocurrency ecosystem.

extracted_news.title: Binance Announces New Altcoin Pair Listings and Zero Maker Fees on FDUSD Pairs
extracted_news.body: Binance, a popular cryptocurrency exchange, announced the listing of new altcoin pairs on its platform. The exchange is set to introduce new trading pairs and trading bots services on the spot platform to enhance users' trading options and overall experience. The new trading pairs include JUP/USDC and PENDLE/FDUSD, which will be available for trading from February 7, 2024, at 11:00 AM. Additionally, Binance announced zero maker fees on FDUSD trading pairs for an unspecified period to encourage participation in the FDUSD market. These initiatives are part of Binance's commitment to improving its platform by offering greater flexibility and diversified trading strategies to its users.

extracted_news.title: BounceBit Expands Deposit Options to Include USDT and FDUSD
extracted_news.body: BounceBit, the Bitcoin collateral chain under the decentralized auction platform Bounce, now supports user deposits in USDT on Ethereum and FDUSD on BNB Chain. This announcement was made on February 1st, indicating an expansion of the platform's capabilities to accommodate more types of digital currencies.

extracted_news.title: Binance to Launch APT/FDUSD and BLUR/USDC Spot Trading Pairs with Trading Bot Services
extracted_news.body: Binance will add APT/FDUSD and BLUR/USDC spot trading pairs as well as trading bot services. According to an official announcement by BlockBeats on January 25th, Binance will launch APT/FDUSD and BLUR/USDC spot trading pairs on January 26th, 2024 at 16:00 (UTC+8). Furthermore, Binance will provide trading bot services for the following trading pairs on the same day and time: spot grid, spot DCA (dollar-cost averaging), smart position: MANTA/USDT, spot algorithmic orders: APT/FDUSD, BLUR/USDC.

extracted_news.title: FDUSD Market Cap Hits $2.5 Billion with 45.9% Growth, Stablecoin Market Reaches $135 Billion
extracted_news.body: The market capitalization of FDUSD has surpassed $2.5 billion, marking a significant 45.9% increase in the past 30 days. According to CoinGecko data reported by BlockBeats on January 22nd, the total market value of stablecoins has reached $135.324 billion. USDT remains the dominant stablecoin with a 72.06% market share and a 4.2% increase in market value over the past month. USDC and DAI follow, with USDC experiencing a similar 4.2% increase and DAI seeing a 2.3% decrease in market value. FDUSD stands out with its substantial growth, ranking fourth among stablecoins.

extracted_news.title: Stablecoins Tether (USDT) and First Digital USD (FDUSD) Attract Investors, PUSHD's Presale Offers Innovative
extracted_news.body: Stablecoins like Tether (USDT) and First Digital USD (FDUSD) are attracting investors' attention, while PUSHD's presale offers an innovative investment opportunity. Tether (USDT) recently achieved a valuation of $93 billion, raising concerns about its rapid growth. In contrast, First Digital USD (FDUSD) stands out as a stable digital currency with a market cap of $1.80 billion. PUSHD is an innovative web3 marketplace in decentralized commerce, offering lower fees and instant transactions. Its presale presents an appealing investment opportunity poised for growth in the 2024 bull market.

extracted_news.title: Binance Converts Eligible Users' BUSD Tokens to FDUSD
extracted_news.body: Binance has converted all eligible users' BUSD tokens to FDUSD. According to an official announcement from BlockBeats on January 5th, Binance has converted all eligible users' BUSD token balances to FDUSD tokens. Users can view their FDUSD tokens through distribution history or flash exchange history. All eligible BUSD token balances in users' spot and funding accounts have been distributed at a ratio of 1 BUSD to 1 FDUSD. The BUSD token deposit service has resumed, and users can continue to deposit BUSD tokens. Eligible users' successful BUSD deposits will be automatically converted to FDUSD tokens at a ratio of 1:1 on each working day. This service may be suspended without further notice. In addition, users can manually exchange their BUSD tokens for FDUSD tokens at a ratio of 1:1 using the flash exchange function until further notice.

extracted_news.title: The 42nd project of Binance's new coin mining has launched, using BNB, FDUSD, and TUSD to mine Sleepless
extracted_news.body:
BlockBeats News, on December 26th, according to the official announcement, Binance's new coin mining has launched its 42nd project - Sleepless AI (AI), a Web3+AI gaming platform. 

Users can invest BNB, FDUSD, and TUSD into the AI mining pool on the Launchpad website after 08:00 on December 28th, 2023 (GMT+8) to receive AI rewards. AI can be mined for a total of 7 days. 

Binance will list Sleepless AI (AI) on January 4th, 2024 at 18:00 (GMT+8) and open AI/BTC, AI/USDT, AI/BNB, AI/FDUSD, AI/TUSD, and AI/TRY trading markets, applying seed label trading rules.

extracted_news.title: has been launched on Binance's new coin mining Fair Mode, with NFPrompt (NFP) being mined using BNB, FDUSD
extracted_news.body:
BlockBeats news, on December 19th, according to official sources, Binance's new coin mining Fair Mode launched its 41st project, NFPrompt (NFP), which can be mined using BNB, FDUSD, and TUSD. Users can deposit BNB, FDUSD, and TUSD into the NFP mining pool on the Launchpad website after 08:00 on December 20th (UTC+8) to receive NFP rewards. NFP can be mined for a total of 7 days.

Fair Mode is a new mode launched by Binance Launchpool. The tokens issued under this mode will have a significantly increased initial circulation (all Launchpool tokens will be released before listing) to protect the community and retail investors and maximize user benefits. In addition, it will permanently block a portion of the allocation from entering circulation to further reduce inflationary pressures. For more details, please refer to the exploration of token economic models and development.

According to the Binance announcement, NFPrompt (NFP) is an AI-driven user-generated content (UGC) platform for Web3 creators.

extracted_news.title: Data: FDUSD has issued a total of 420 million tokens in the past three days, with a current circulating
extracted_news.body:
BlockBeats News, on December 15th, according to monitoring by @ai_9684xtpa, since Binance launched the Fusionist (ACE) staking mining on December 13th, FDUSD has issued a total of 420 million tokens, with a current circulation of 1.49 billion tokens. The token flow is as follows:

· 91.02 million tokens directly flowed to Binance
· 35 million tokens were minted by Wintermute and then transferred to Binance
· 290 million tokens were suspected to be minted by market maker Portofino Technologies' address starting with 0xeE and have been transferred to Binance, of which 100 million tokens were minted 6 hours ago.

extracted_news.title: Wintermute minted 15 million FDUSD tokens 3 hours ago and transferred them all to Binance.
extracted_news.body: BlockBeats News, December 13th - According to The Data Nerd's monitoring, Wintermute Trading minted 15 million FDUSD tokens 3 hours ago and transferred them all to Binance. In the past 3 months, Wintermute Trading has minted a total of 58 million FDUSD tokens.

extracted_news.title: Binance will open trading pairs for FIDA/TRY, INJ/FDUSD, and provide trading bot services for JTO/USDT
extracted_news.body: According to official sources, on December 13th, BlockBeats News reported that Binance will open FIDA/TRY, INJ/FDUSD, IOTA/TRY, MEME/ETH, SAND/FDUSD, and SHIB/FDUSD spot trading pairs at 16:00 on December 14th, 2023 (Beijing time). At the same time, trading robot services will be added for BLUR/USDT, JTO/USDT, and VANRY/USDT trading pairs.

extracted_news.title: FDUSD is trading at a positive premium of approximately 0.5%, currently quoted at 1.0056 US dollars.
extracted_news.body:
BlockBeats news, on December 13th, due to the launch of the 40th new coin mining on Binance, the use of BNB and FDUSD to mine Fusionist (ACE) has caused a positive premium for FDUSD, with a premium rate of approximately 0.5%, currently trading at 1.0056 USD.

Users can invest BNB and FDUSD into the ACE mining pool on the Launchpad website after 08:00 on December 13th to receive ACE rewards. A total of 5 days of mining is available for ACE.

extracted_news.title: Binance launches the 40th phase of new coin mining, allowing the use of BNB and FDUSD to mine Fusionist
extracted_news.body:
According to an official announcement from BlockBeats on December 11th, Binance has launched the 40th new coin mining project, Fusionist (ACE), which can be mined using BNB and FDUSD. Users can invest BNB and FDUSD into the ACE mining pool on the Launchpad website to receive ACE rewards starting from 08:00 on December 13th, 2023 (GMT+8), and the mining period will last for 5 days. The website is expected to be updated approximately five hours after this announcement, before the mining activity opens.

Binance has scheduled the listing of Fusionist (ACE) on December 18th, 2023 at 14:00 (GMT+8), and will open the ACE/BTC, ACE/USDT, ACE/BNB, ACE/FDUSD, and ACE/TRY trading markets, which will follow seed label trading rules.

extracted_news.title: The circulating market value of FDUSD has reached $1 billion.
extracted_news.body: According to official sources, the circulating market value of the stablecoin FDUSD has reached 1 billion US dollars, as reported by BlockBeats News on December 5th.

extracted_news.title: Binance to End BUSD Support on December 15, Convert User Balances to FDUSD
extracted_news.body: Binance has announced that it will cease support for BUSD products on December 15, 2023. Users are encouraged to withdraw or convert their BUSD assets into other available assets on Binance before the deadline. BUSD can be converted to FDUSD at a 1:1 rate with zero trading fees. From December 31, BUSD withdrawals will be disabled and balances will be automatically converted to FDUSD at a 1:1 conversion rate for users outside of Japan, France, Italy, Poland, and Kazakhstan.

extracted_news.title: Binance will add new spot trading pairs such as BLUR/FDUSD and DYDX/TRY.
extracted_news.body: BlockBeats news on November 29th, according to an official announcement, Binance will launch BLUR/FDUSD, DYDX/TRY, SUPER/FDUSD, USTC/FDUSD, and USTC/TRY spot trading pairs on November 30th, 2023 at 16:00 (GMT+8).

extracted_news.title: Binance will add spot trading pairs for DOT/TUSD and GALA/FDUSD, as well as trading bot services.
extracted_news.body:
According to an official announcement from BlockBeats on November 22nd, Binance will launch the following spot trading pairs on November 23rd, 2023 at 16:00 (GMT+8): DOT/TUSD, GALA/FDUSD, GAS/TRY, NTRN/TRY, and WLD/FDUSD.

In addition, Binance will offer trading bot services for the following trading pairs starting from the same time: spot grid, spot DCA (dollar-cost averaging), and intelligent position management for BEAMX/USDT.

extracted_news.title: Binance has added spot trading pairs such as CAKE/TUSD, DYDX/FDUSD, PIVX/USDT.
extracted_news.body: According to an official announcement from BlockBeats on November 15th, Binance will launch ARK/TRY, BEAMX/TRY, CAKE/TRY, CAKE/TUSD, DYDX/FDUSD, PIVX/USDT, RUNE/FDUSD, and TIA/TUSD spot trading pairs on November 16th, 2023 at 4:00 PM (GMT+8).

extracted_news.title: Binance has integrated BNB, FDUSD, and USDT onto the OpBNB network and opened up deposit and withdrawal
extracted_news.body: BlockBeats reported on November 8th that, according to an official announcement, Binance has now completed the integration of BNB, FDUSD and USDT on the OpBNB network, and has opened deposit and withdrawal services.

extracted_news.title: Weekly Update - DeFi and Layer 1 & Layer 2 News (Week 30, 20/07/2023 - 26/07/2023)
extracted_news.body: This week's DeFi market indices were negative. Real-world assets are being tokenized on the blockchain. MakerDAO launched a token buyback program. Polygon introduced a new governance framework. Optimism proposed adding ZK-proofs to OP chains. Wormhole Foundation launched Gateway, connecting liquidity from different blockchains. dYdX unveiled its public testnet for v4. CLabs proposed transitioning Celo to an Ethereum Layer-2 solution. Alphapo allegedly experienced a hack. Conic Finance and Era Lend suffered hacking incidents. Recent research reports explore ZK rollups and Layer-0 protocols. Recent university articles discuss crypto and IoT, Reddit's MOON and BRICK tokens, and XRP.

extracted_news.title: Starship: Beyond —  A Mobile Retro Action RPG by Metasource Games
extracted_news.body: "Starship: Beyond is a game where players inhabit a spaceship called the Beyond and travel to different planets to gather resources. Players embark on missions to fight aliens, collect supplies, and explore new landscapes. The game features a seasonal system where players can influence the next planet the Beyond travels to. Gear crafted by players can be traded in-game or exported to the WAX Blockchain as an NFT. The game also includes crafting options and a demo version for players to experience. Founder's Badges will offer perks and exclusive gear. Join the community on Twitter and Discord for more information."

extracted_news.title: Win Big with Solv’s Seed Money Giveaway!
extracted_news.body: Solv is introducing an Open-Ended Fund, allowing users to invest in funds without restrictive issuance periods. In a giveaway event, three selected users will split a $30,000 Seed Money Pool and pioneer investing in the new open-ended funds. Winners can use the Seed Money for 90 days, and any profits made belong to the user. The event starts on July 24th, and participants can enter by following Solv on Twitter, joining their Discord and Telegram, retweeting the event tweet, and visiting their official website. Winners will be announced on July 30th, and the process for claiming the prize and purchasing the fund is outlined. The first open-ended fund on Solv V3 will be the Blockin-GMX Fund.

extracted_news.title: MixMarvel and NuLink Partner to Bring Blockchain to the Masses

NuLink's network provides secure data sharing and access control, enhancing user privacy and security. The partnership will lead to increased scalability, reliability, and adoption of blockchain technology in the gaming industry.

extracted_news.title: Axie Infinity’s AXP Evolution 💠
extracted_news.body: Axie Infinity has launched a new onchain leveling system called Axie Experience Points (AXP), which could have a significant impact on the NFT ecosystem. AXP allows players to progress their Axies and upgrade their parts over time. Points are earned through gameplay, and ascension processes sync an Axie's level and allow for part upgrades. This new system turns Axies into dynamic NFTs that can evolve and be personalized through gameplay. AXP also provides a blueprint for other NFT games and projects to implement their own leveling systems. The launch of AXP marks a turning point that could lead to onchain leveling becoming a mainstay in the web3 gaming and other sectors of the space.

detailed_analysis.title: Tether (USDT) Hits $100 Billion Market Cap, Faces Competition from First Digital USD (FDUSD)
detailed_analysis.body: Tether (USDT) achieves $100 billion market cap, becoming the third cryptocurrency to enter the exclusive club. However, its trading volumes still lag behind 2021 peaks. Binance-backed First Digital USD (FDUSD) emerges as a strong competitor, capturing a significant market share.

detailed_analysis.title: Binance to Launch New Spot Trading Pairs Including OM/TRY and PEPE/FDUSD
detailed_analysis.body: Binance is set to expand its spot trading offerings by adding new pairs such as OM/TRY, PEPE/FDUSD, PIXEL/USDC, STRK/USDC, THETA/TRY, and UNI/FDUSD. According to BlockBeats news on March 4th, these trading pairs will be available from 16:00 on March 5th, aiming to provide users with a broader range of options for spot trading.

detailed_analysis.title: Binance Futures to Cease Support for USDP as Cross Collateral, Introduces FDUSD
detailed_analysis.body: Starting from 17:00 on March 8, 2024, Binance Futures will support FDUSD as a joint margin asset, and will stop supporting USDP as a joint margin asset at 14:00 on March 14, 2024 (Beijing time). Due to this change, the transfer limit of USDP under the joint margin mode has been updated to zero. After 14:00 on March 14, 2024, any remaining USDP balance in the U-based contract wallet will be automatically converted to USDT at a ratio of 1:1, which may take approximately 24 hours and may not be displayed in the transaction history.

detailed_analysis.title: FDUSD Trading Pair Reaches Historical High in Binance Spot Trading
detailed_analysis.body: The trading volume of the FDUSD trading pair in Binance spot trading has reached a historical high, accounting for 38% of the total trading volume. According to BlockBeats news on February 15th, data from The Block Pro shows that as of February 12th, the trading volume of the FDUSD trading pair on Binance spot trading has risen to 38%, reaching a historical high, and the trading volume has increased by 42.6% month-on-month in January.

detailed_analysis.title: FDUSD Reaches Record Trading Volume on Binance After Replacing BUSD
detailed_analysis.body: The First Digital USD Stablecoin (FDUSD) and spot trading volume on Binance reached its highest ever share, accounting for 38% of the exchange's total spot trading volume on February 12. This marks a significant increase of 42.6% compared to the previous month, highlighting the growing importance of FDUSD in the crypto trading landscape. The increase in FDUSD trading volume is attributed to Binance's decision to discontinue support for BUSD, encouraging users to switch to FDUSD. Introduced by FD121, a subsidiary of Hong Kong-based custody and trust company First Digital, FDUSD was launched in June 2023 and listed on Binance a month later with zero trading fees. This significant increase in trading volume indicates that stablecoins, especially those with favorable trading conditions and solid utility, are increasingly preferred in the cryptocurrency ecosystem.

detailed_analysis.title: Binance Announces New Altcoin Pair Listings and Zero Maker Fees on FDUSD Pairs
detailed_analysis.body: Binance, a popular cryptocurrency exchange, announced the listing of new altcoin pairs on its platform. The exchange is set to introduce new trading pairs and trading bots services on the spot platform to enhance users' trading options and overall experience. The new trading pairs include JUP/USDC and PENDLE/FDUSD, which will be available for trading from February 7, 2024, at 11:00 AM. Additionally, Binance announced zero maker fees on FDUSD trading pairs for an unspecified period to encourage participation in the FDUSD market. These initiatives are part of Binance's commitment to improving its platform by offering greater flexibility and diversified trading strategies to its users.

detailed_analysis.title: BounceBit Expands Deposit Options to Include USDT and FDUSD
detailed_analysis.body: BounceBit, the Bitcoin collateral chain under the decentralized auction platform Bounce, now supports user deposits in USDT on Ethereum and FDUSD on BNB Chain. This announcement was made on February 1st, indicating an expansion of the platform's capabilities to accommodate more types of digital currencies.

detailed_analysis.title: Binance to Launch APT/FDUSD and BLUR/USDC Spot Trading Pairs with Trading Bot Services
detailed_analysis.body: Binance will add APT/FDUSD and BLUR/USDC spot trading pairs as well as trading bot services. According to an official announcement by BlockBeats on January 25th, Binance will launch APT/FDUSD and BLUR/USDC spot trading pairs on January 26th, 2024 at 16:00 (UTC+8). Furthermore, Binance will provide trading bot services for the following trading pairs on the same day and time: spot grid, spot DCA (dollar-cost averaging), smart position: MANTA/USDT, spot algorithmic orders: APT/FDUSD, BLUR/USDC.

detailed_analysis.title: FDUSD Market Cap Hits $2.5 Billion with 45.9% Growth, Stablecoin Market Reaches $135 Billion
detailed_analysis.body: The market capitalization of FDUSD has surpassed $2.5 billion, marking a significant 45.9% increase in the past 30 days. According to CoinGecko data reported by BlockBeats on January 22nd, the total market value of stablecoins has reached $135.324 billion. USDT remains the dominant stablecoin with a 72.06% market share and a 4.2% increase in market value over the past month. USDC and DAI follow, with USDC experiencing a similar 4.2% increase and DAI seeing a 2.3% decrease in market value. FDUSD stands out with its substantial growth, ranking fourth among stablecoins.

detailed_analysis.title: Stablecoins Tether (USDT) and First Digital USD (FDUSD) Attract Investors, PUSHD's Presale Offers Innovative
detailed_analysis.body: Stablecoins like Tether (USDT) and First Digital USD (FDUSD) are attracting investors' attention, while PUSHD's presale offers an innovative investment opportunity. Tether (USDT) recently achieved a valuation of $93 billion, raising concerns about its rapid growth. In contrast, First Digital USD (FDUSD) stands out as a stable digital currency with a market cap of $1.80 billion. PUSHD is an innovative web3 marketplace in decentralized commerce, offering lower fees and instant transactions. Its presale presents an appealing investment opportunity poised for growth in the 2024 bull market.

detailed_analysis.title: Binance Converts Eligible Users' BUSD Tokens to FDUSD
detailed_analysis.body: Binance has converted all eligible users' BUSD tokens to FDUSD. According to an official announcement from BlockBeats on January 5th, Binance has converted all eligible users' BUSD token balances to FDUSD tokens. Users can view their FDUSD tokens through distribution history or flash exchange history. All eligible BUSD token balances in users' spot and funding accounts have been distributed at a ratio of 1 BUSD to 1 FDUSD. The BUSD token deposit service has resumed, and users can continue to deposit BUSD tokens. Eligible users' successful BUSD deposits will be automatically converted to FDUSD tokens at a ratio of 1:1 on each working day. This service may be suspended without further notice. In addition, users can manually exchange their BUSD tokens for FDUSD tokens at a ratio of 1:1 using the flash exchange function until further notice.

detailed_analysis.title: The 42nd project of Binance's new coin mining has launched, using BNB, FDUSD, and TUSD to mine Sleepless
detailed_analysis.body:
BlockBeats News, on December 26th, according to the official announcement, Binance's new coin mining has launched its 42nd project - Sleepless AI (AI), a Web3+AI gaming platform. 

Users can invest BNB, FDUSD, and TUSD into the AI mining pool on the Launchpad website after 08:00 on December 28th, 2023 (GMT+8) to receive AI rewards. AI can be mined for a total of 7 days. 

Binance will list Sleepless AI (AI) on January 4th, 2024 at 18:00 (GMT+8) and open AI/BTC, AI/USDT, AI/BNB, AI/FDUSD, AI/TUSD, and AI/TRY trading markets, applying seed label trading rules.

detailed_analysis.title: has been launched on Binance's new coin mining Fair Mode, with NFPrompt (NFP) being mined using BNB, FDUSD
detailed_analysis.body:
BlockBeats news, on December 19th, according to official sources, Binance's new coin mining Fair Mode launched its 41st project, NFPrompt (NFP), which can be mined using BNB, FDUSD, and TUSD. Users can deposit BNB, FDUSD, and TUSD into the NFP mining pool on the Launchpad website after 08:00 on December 20th (UTC+8) to receive NFP rewards. NFP can be mined for a total of 7 days.

Fair Mode is a new mode launched by Binance Launchpool. The tokens issued under this mode will have a significantly increased initial circulation (all Launchpool tokens will be released before listing) to protect the community and retail investors and maximize user benefits. In addition, it will permanently block a portion of the allocation from entering circulation to further reduce inflationary pressures. For more details, please refer to the exploration of token economic models and development.

According to the Binance announcement, NFPrompt (NFP) is an AI-driven user-generated content (UGC) platform for Web3 creators.

detailed_analysis.title: Data: FDUSD has issued a total of 420 million tokens in the past three days, with a current circulating
detailed_analysis.body:
BlockBeats News, on December 15th, according to monitoring by @ai_9684xtpa, since Binance launched the Fusionist (ACE) staking mining on December 13th, FDUSD has issued a total of 420 million tokens, with a current circulation of 1.49 billion tokens. The token flow is as follows:

· 91.02 million tokens directly flowed to Binance
· 35 million tokens were minted by Wintermute and then transferred to Binance
· 290 million tokens were suspected to be minted by market maker Portofino Technologies' address starting with 0xeE and have been transferred to Binance, of which 100 million tokens were minted 6 hours ago.

detailed_analysis.title: Wintermute minted 15 million FDUSD tokens 3 hours ago and transferred them all to Binance.
detailed_analysis.body: BlockBeats News, December 13th - According to The Data Nerd's monitoring, Wintermute Trading minted 15 million FDUSD tokens 3 hours ago and transferred them all to Binance. In the past 3 months, Wintermute Trading has minted a total of 58 million FDUSD tokens.

detailed_analysis.title: Binance will open trading pairs for FIDA/TRY, INJ/FDUSD, and provide trading bot services for JTO/USDT
detailed_analysis.body: According to official sources, on December 13th, BlockBeats News reported that Binance will open FIDA/TRY, INJ/FDUSD, IOTA/TRY, MEME/ETH, SAND/FDUSD, and SHIB/FDUSD spot trading pairs at 16:00 on December 14th, 2023 (Beijing time). At the same time, trading robot services will be added for BLUR/USDT, JTO/USDT, and VANRY/USDT trading pairs.

detailed_analysis.title: FDUSD is trading at a positive premium of approximately 0.5%, currently quoted at 1.0056 US dollars.
detailed_analysis.body:
BlockBeats news, on December 13th, due to the launch of the 40th new coin mining on Binance, the use of BNB and FDUSD to mine Fusionist (ACE) has caused a positive premium for FDUSD, with a premium rate of approximately 0.5%, currently trading at 1.0056 USD.

Users can invest BNB and FDUSD into the ACE mining pool on the Launchpad website after 08:00 on December 13th to receive ACE rewards. A total of 5 days of mining is available for ACE.

detailed_analysis.title: Binance launches the 40th phase of new coin mining, allowing the use of BNB and FDUSD to mine Fusionist
detailed_analysis.body:
According to an official announcement from BlockBeats on December 11th, Binance has launched the 40th new coin mining project, Fusionist (ACE), which can be mined using BNB and FDUSD. Users can invest BNB and FDUSD into the ACE mining pool on the Launchpad website to receive ACE rewards starting from 08:00 on December 13th, 2023 (GMT+8), and the mining period will last for 5 days. The website is expected to be updated approximately five hours after this announcement, before the mining activity opens.

Binance has scheduled the listing of Fusionist (ACE) on December 18th, 2023 at 14:00 (GMT+8), and will open the ACE/BTC, ACE/USDT, ACE/BNB, ACE/FDUSD, and ACE/TRY trading markets, which will follow seed label trading rules.

detailed_analysis.title: The circulating market value of FDUSD has reached $1 billion.
detailed_analysis.body: According to official sources, the circulating market value of the stablecoin FDUSD has reached 1 billion US dollars, as reported by BlockBeats News on December 5th.

detailed_analysis.title: Binance to End BUSD Support on December 15, Convert User Balances to FDUSD
detailed_analysis.body: Binance has announced that it will cease support for BUSD products on December 15, 2023. Users are encouraged to withdraw or convert their BUSD assets into other available assets on Binance before the deadline. BUSD can be converted to FDUSD at a 1:1 rate with zero trading fees. From December 31, BUSD withdrawals will be disabled and balances will be automatically converted to FDUSD at a 1:1 conversion rate for users outside of Japan, France, Italy, Poland, and Kazakhstan.

detailed_analysis.title: Binance will add new spot trading pairs such as BLUR/FDUSD and DYDX/TRY.
detailed_analysis.body: BlockBeats news on November 29th, according to an official announcement, Binance will launch BLUR/FDUSD, DYDX/TRY, SUPER/FDUSD, USTC/FDUSD, and USTC/TRY spot trading pairs on November 30th, 2023 at 16:00 (GMT+8).

detailed_analysis.title: Binance will add spot trading pairs for DOT/TUSD and GALA/FDUSD, as well as trading bot services.
detailed_analysis.body:
According to an official announcement from BlockBeats on November 22nd, Binance will launch the following spot trading pairs on November 23rd, 2023 at 16:00 (GMT+8): DOT/TUSD, GALA/FDUSD, GAS/TRY, NTRN/TRY, and WLD/FDUSD.

In addition, Binance will offer trading bot services for the following trading pairs starting from the same time: spot grid, spot DCA (dollar-cost averaging), and intelligent position management for BEAMX/USDT.

detailed_analysis.title: Binance has added spot trading pairs such as CAKE/TUSD, DYDX/FDUSD, PIVX/USDT.
detailed_analysis.body: According to an official announcement from BlockBeats on November 15th, Binance will launch ARK/TRY, BEAMX/TRY, CAKE/TRY, CAKE/TUSD, DYDX/FDUSD, PIVX/USDT, RUNE/FDUSD, and TIA/TUSD spot trading pairs on November 16th, 2023 at 4:00 PM (GMT+8).

detailed_analysis.title: Binance has integrated BNB, FDUSD, and USDT onto the OpBNB network and opened up deposit and withdrawal
detailed_analysis.body: BlockBeats reported on November 8th that, according to an official announcement, Binance has now completed the integration of BNB, FDUSD and USDT on the OpBNB network, and has opened deposit and withdrawal services.

detailed_analysis.title: Starship: Beyond —  A Mobile Retro Action RPG by Metasource Games
detailed_analysis.body: "Starship: Beyond is a game where players inhabit a spaceship called the Beyond and travel to different planets to gather resources. Players embark on missions to fight aliens, collect supplies, and explore new landscapes. The game features a seasonal system where players can influence the next planet the Beyond travels to. Gear crafted by players can be traded in-game or exported to the WAX Blockchain as an NFT. The game also includes crafting options and a demo version for players to experience. Founder's Badges will offer perks and exclusive gear. Join the community on Twitter and Discord for more information."

detailed_analysis.title: Win Big with Solv’s Seed Money Giveaway!
detailed_analysis.body: Solv is introducing an Open-Ended Fund, allowing users to invest in funds without restrictive issuance periods. In a giveaway event, three selected users will split a $30,000 Seed Money Pool and pioneer investing in the new open-ended funds. Winners can use the Seed Money for 90 days, and any profits made belong to the user. The event starts on July 24th, and participants can enter by following Solv on Twitter, joining their Discord and Telegram, retweeting the event tweet, and visiting their official website. Winners will be announced on July 30th, and the process for claiming the prize and purchasing the fund is outlined. The first open-ended fund on Solv V3 will be the Blockin-GMX Fund.

The partnership will lead to increased scalability, reliability, and adoption of blockchain technology in the gaming industry.

detailed_analysis.title: Axie Infinity’s AXP Evolution 💠
detailed_analysis.body: Axie Infinity has launched a new onchain leveling system called Axie Experience Points (AXP), which could have a significant impact on the NFT ecosystem. AXP allows players to progress their Axies and upgrade their parts over time. Points are earned through gameplay, and ascension processes sync an Axie's level and allow for part upgrades. This new system turns Axies into dynamic NFTs that can evolve and be personalized through gameplay. AXP also provides a blueprint for other NFT games and projects to implement their own leveling systems. The launch of AXP marks a turning point that could lead to onchain leveling becoming a mainstay in the web3 gaming and other sectors of the space.
